definition: incense burning in front of a temple/burning joss sticks
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: The incense container in the temple is rusty but never empty.
sentences.chinese: 廟裏的香爐鏽跡斑斑但是卻從來不缺少香火。

sentences.english: For example, we bought our incense sticks at this market.
sentences.chinese: 比如，我們在這個集市購買香火。

sentences.english: See the Buddhist holy places, and far to see iron temple, incense quite sheng. Run!
sentences.chinese: 看到佛家聖地了，遠遠看見鐵林寺，香火蠻盛的。

sentences.english: On every full moon, the girl would burned incenses and wax candles to worship the moon.
sentences.chinese: 在每滿月，女孩被燒的香火和蠟蠟燭會崇拜月亮。

sentences.english: A very prosperous small temple on the side road.
sentences.chinese: 香火相當旺盛的街邊小廟。

sentences.english: In the ancient incense hall also saw Mao, a carved beam.
sentences.chinese: 在最古老的毛氏香火堂，也只看到一條梁有雕花。

sentences.english: There are endless stream of pilgrims in this temple, who come here to worship the gods and pray.
sentences.chinese: 這座寺廟的香火很旺，前來拜佛許願的人很多。

sentences.english: Now Yonghegong is a temple belonging to the Yellow Hats, and it is very prosperous.
sentences.chinese: 現在的雍和宮屬於黃教的寺廟，香火很旺。

sentences.english: The jade lotus temple good believes is numerous, the joss stick is vigorous.
sentences.chinese: 玉蓮寺善男信女衆多，香火鼎盛。

sentences.english: Followers and visitors have been loyal t the temple and oblations are always given to it.
sentences.chinese: 信衆遊客對紅廟一直虔誠有加，香火不絕。

sentences.english: Putuo Mountain becomes a busy and crowded place of worship for Buddhists and all snakes then disappear from sight.
sentences.chinese: 從此，普陀山上香火旺盛，蛇的蹤影也隨之不見了。

sentences.english: There are incense filled the room all day, visitors like the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 這裏終日香火鼎盛，遊客如雲。

sentences.english: Temple in the Ming Dynasty, expansion, and then into the incense resort.
sentences.chinese: 明代寺院擴建，遂成香火勝地。

definition: to consecrate/to enshrine and worship/an offering (to one's ancestors)/a sacrifice (to a God)
to burn incense and worship Buddha
to burn incense at a temple
